title: 24 November '63
credit_line: Gift of the Howard Heinz Endowment
provenance_text:
Pierre Soulages [b. 1919], Paris, France; Samuel M. Kootz Gallery, New York, NY, until January 1965 [1]; purchased by Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, May 1965 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was no. 80 in "The 1964 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at the Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1964 - January 1965. It was lent by Samuel M. Kootz Gallery, New York, NY. The painting received one of two painting awards given at the exhibition.
[2]. The painting was purchased by Carnegie Institute from the 1964 International as a gift of the Howard Heinz Endowment, Pittsburgh, PA. Payment to Samuel M. Kootz Gallery was sent on January 26, 1965. The painting was accessioned later, on May 11, 1965.
